import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { }
